transcript:
Customer: Ye in bhai sahab ne banaya tha.
Customer: Kya baat hui?
Customer: Iski lead mein iske main jo product hai usme lead nahi hai.
Customer: Aur ye mera review dila dega? Ye mera review dilaega?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir, mera ek sir se baat hui thi wo bol rahe the ki koi call nahi thi.
Executive: Nahi abhi calls aayi nahi wo bol rahe the ki kya hai kya nahi hai.
Customer: Wo is samne se call jo hai na wo aati hai.
Customer: Kaise sir?
Executive: Bol rahe the ki wo samne se main call karke check karunga ki call mujhe receive ho rahi hai ki nahi ho rahi hai.
Customer: India Mart mein aap mam kal jayengi na office?
Customer: Kaise sir? Sir aapki na aawaz hi nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Aap kal office jayengi na?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: To mam kal aapse connect karte hain, theek hai? Aapka network ka bhi issue bhi hai. Theek hai.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- No leads in the main product.

- Wants review to be done.

- Not receiving calls.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, review, calls, network
